Dialogue.Page: The Hearthian legend Feldspar has made several grand endeavors.
We've seen their ship bounce from planet to planet, so much so that we've started theorizing how their adventures even went.
Xenon got particularly motivated to write stories about him. In one instance, they descend into Brittle Hollow with no way out.
But good ol' Feldspar, they always find a way. They snagged a nearby Nomai Tractor Beam from one of the ruins and positioned themselves under a hole in the crust above.
Once in the right spot, they placed it down and let the tractor beams push them back to the surface.
Sometimes we Karvi wonder if they actually did things like these.
